title: How to Create a Full Character in 3D - Workflow Explained

media:group.media:title: How to Create a Full Character in 3D - Workflow Explained
media:group.media:description:
Realistic Character Portrait Masterclass:
https://flipnm.co/characterMasterclass

In this video tutorial, you'll learn the whole workflow for making a realistic character using Blender, ZBrush and Substance Painter.

Sculpting in ZBrush - 01:54
Retopology in Blender - 07:34
Reprojection in ZBrush - 12:23
UVs in Blender - 14:46
Production Sculpting - 16:51
Sculpting Pores - 17:23
Texture Painting in Substance Painter - 19:43
Final Maps in Painter (Base Color, Roughness, Scattering) - 23:41
Skin Shading in Blender - 29:05
AgX - 33:25
Groom - 35:02
Lighting and Final Render - 37:31
Post Processing in Photoshop - 41:09

AgX Download:
https://github.com/sobotka/AgX
